Content:: Shantha Sisira Kumara Abeysekara as known as "Shantha Abeysekara" is a Sri Lankan politician and a member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka. He was elected from Puttalam District in 2015. He is a Member of the United National Party.[1][2] He was elected from the electorate of Chilaw of Puttalam District in August 2015. Also, he is a former Member of North Western Provincial Council and, has had been elected thrice in a row.  This article about a politician from North Western Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Shantha Abeysekara - Wikipedia
